   522â†’### Banco de Dados - Estrutura Completa
   523â†’
   524â†’```sql
   525â†’-- 1. BARBERSHOPS (Barbearias)
   526â†’CREATE TABLE barbershops (
   527â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   528â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   529â†’    slug VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
   530â†’    logo_url TEXT,
   531â†’    address JSONB,
   532â†’    phone VARCHAR(20),
   533â†’    email VARCHAR(255),
   534â†’    plan_id VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'basic',
   535â†’    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
   536â†’    owner_id UUID,
   537â†’    settings JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
   538â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   539â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   540â†’);
   541â†’
   542â†’-- 2. CLIENTS (Clientes)
   543â†’CREATE TABLE clients (
   544â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   545â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
   546â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   547â†’    phone VARCHAR(20),
   548â†’    email VARCHAR(255),
   549â†’    birth_date DATE,
   550â†’    address TEXT,
   551â†’    preferred_barber_id UUID,
   552â†’    client_since DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
   553â†’    total_visits INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
   554â†’    total_spent DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
   555â†’    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active',
   556â†’    notes TEXT,
   557â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   558â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   559â†’);
   560â†’
   561â†’-- 3. BARBERS (Barbeiros)
   562â†’CREATE TABLE barbers (
   563â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   564â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
   565â†’    user_id UUID,
   566â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   567â†’    phone VARCHAR(20),
   568â†’    email VARCHAR(255),
   569â†’    photo_url TEXT,
   570â†’    specialty TEXT[],
   571â†’    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
   572â†’    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active',
   573â†’    hire_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
   574â†’    working_hours JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
   575â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   576â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   577â†’);
   578â†’
   579â†’-- 4. SERVICES (ServiÃ§os)
   580â†’CREATE TABLE services (
   581â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   582â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
   583â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   584â†’    description TEXT,
   585â†’    category VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'corte',
   586â†’    duration INTEGER NOT NULL,
   587â†’    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   588â†’    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
   589â†’    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
   590â†’    image_url TEXT,
   591â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   592â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   593â†’);
   594â†’
   595â†’-- 5. PRODUCTS (Produtos)
   596â†’CREATE TABLE products (
   597â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   598â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
   599â†’    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   600â†’    description TEXT,
   601â†’    category VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'outros',
   602â†’    brand VARCHAR(100),
   603â†’    barcode VARCHAR(50),
   604â†’    cost_price DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
   605â†’    sell_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   606â†’    current_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
   607â†’    min_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 5,
   608â†’    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
   609â†’    image_url TEXT,
   610â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   611â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   612â†’);
   613â†’
   614â†’-- 6. APPOINTMENTS (Agendamentos)
   615â†’CREATE TABLE appointments (
   616â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   617â†’    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
   618â†’    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id),
   619â†’    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
   620â†’    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id),
   621â†’    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
   622â†’    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
   623â†’    duration INTEGER NOT NULL,
   624â†’    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'scheduled',
   625â†’    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
   626â†’    notes TEXT,
   627â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   628â†’    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   629â†’);
   630â†’
   631â†’-- 7. SALES (Vendas)
   632â†’CREATE TABLE sales (
   633â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,

   636â†’    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
   637â†’    appointment_id UUID REFERENCES appointments(id),
   638â†’    sale_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
   639â†’    subtotal DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,

   648â†’
   649â†’-- 8. SALE_ITEMS (Itens da Venda)
   650â†’CREATE TABLE sale_items (
   651â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,

   658â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   659â†’);
   660â†’
   661â†’-- 9. STOCK_MOVEMENTS (MovimentaÃ§Ãµes de Estoque)
   662â†’CREATE TABLE stock_movements (
   663â†’    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,

   668â†’    reference_id UUID,
   669â†’    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
   670â†’);
   671â†’
   672â†’-- 10. BARBER_SERVICES (RelaÃ§Ã£o N:N)
   673â†’CREATE TABLE barber_services (
   674â†’    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),

### Banco de Dados - Estrutura Completa

```sql
-- 1. BARBERSHOPS (Barbearias)
CREATE TABLE barbershops (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    slug VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    logo_url TEXT,
    address JSONB,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    plan_id VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'basic',
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    owner_id UUID,
    settings JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 2. CLIENTS (Clientes)
CREATE TABLE clients (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    birth_date DATE,
    address TEXT,
    preferred_barber_id UUID,
    client_since DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    total_visits INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    total_spent DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active',
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 3. BARBERS (Barbeiros)
CREATE TABLE barbers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    user_id UUID,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    photo_url TEXT,
    specialty TEXT[],
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'active',
    hire_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    working_hours JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 4. SERVICES (ServiÃ§os)
CREATE TABLE services (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'corte',
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 50.00,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 5. PRODUCTS (Produtos)
CREATE TABLE products (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'outros',
    brand VARCHAR(100),
    barcode VARCHAR(50),
    cost_price DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    sell_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    current_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    min_stock INTEGER DEFAULT 5,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    image_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 6. APPOINTMENTS (Agendamentos)
CREATE TABLE appointments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id),
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id),
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
    duration INTEGER NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'scheduled',
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 7. SALES (Vendas)
CREATE TABLE sales (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    barbershop_id UUID REFERENCES barbershops(id),
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(id),
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    appointment_id UUID REFERENCES appointments(id),
    sale_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    subtotal DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    total DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'cash',
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'completed',
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 8. SALE_ITEMS (Itens da Venda)
CREATE TABLE sale_items (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_id UUID REFERENCES sales(id),
    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- service, product
    item_id UUID NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 9. STOCK_MOVEMENTS (MovimentaÃ§Ãµes de Estoque)
CREATE TABLE stock_movements (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(id),
    movement_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- in, out, adjustment
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    reason VARCHAR(255),
    reference_id UUID,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- 10. BARBER_SERVICES (RelaÃ§Ã£o N:N)
CREATE TABLE barber_services (
    barber_id UUID REFERENCES barbers(id),
    service_id UUID REFERENCES services(id),
    PRIMARY KEY (barber_id, service_id)
);
```

import { useState } from 'react'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow, } from '@/components/ui/table'; import { Plus, Search, Package, AlertTriangle, DollarSign, MoreHorizontal, Edit, Trash2 } from 'lucide-react'; import { useBarbershop } from '@/contexts/BarbershopContext'; import CreateProductModal from '@/components/modals/CreateProductModal'; const Products = () => { const { currentBarbershop } = useBarbershop(); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false); // Mock data - TODO: Replace with real data from Supabase const products = [ { id: '1', name: 'Pomada Modeladora', description: 'Pomada premium para cabelo', brand: 'BarberLine', category: 'Cabelo', price: 45, cost: 25, stock: 15, minStock: 5, isActive: true, soldThisMonth: 8 }, { id: '2', name: 'Ã“leo para Barba', description: 'Ã“leo hidratante para barba', brand: 'BeardCare', category: 'Barba', price: 35, cost: 18, stock: 3, minStock: 5, isActive: true, soldThisMonth: 12 }, { id: '3', name: 'Shampoo Anticaspa', description: 'Shampoo medicinal anticaspa', brand: 'CleanHair', category: 'Cabelo', price: 28, cost: 15, stock: 22, minStock: 8, isActive: true, soldThisMonth: 5 }, { id: '4', name: 'Gel Fixador Forte', description: 'Gel com fixaÃ§Ã£o extra forte', brand: 'StyleMax', category: 'Cabelo', price: 32, cost: 20, stock: 0, minStock: 10, isActive: true, soldThisMonth: 0 }, { id: '5', name: 'Cera Modeladora', description: 'Cera para modelagem e brilho', brand: 'BarberLine', category: 'Cabelo', price: 38, cost: 22, stock: 18, minStock: 6, isActive: false, soldThisMonth: 2 } ]; const filteredProducts = products.filter(product => product.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || product.brand.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || product.category.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const stats = { totalProducts: products.length, activeProducts: products.filter(p => p.isActive).length, lowStockProducts: products.filter(p => p.stock <= p.minStock).length, totalValue: products.reduce((acc, p) => acc + (p.price * p.stock), 0), monthlyRevenue: products.reduce((acc, p) => acc + (p.price * p.soldThisMonth), 0) }; const getStockStatus = (product: typeof products[0]) => { if (product.stock === 0) { return Sem Estoque; } if (product.stock <= product.minStock) { return Estoque Baixo; } return Em Estoque; }; return (

R$ 15,00 (existente) - âœ… **Shampoo Anti-Caspa** - R$ 22,00 (existente) ### 3. **Teste de Listagem** ```bash # Busca produtos da barbearia: curl "http://localhost:3001/api/products?barbershop_id=33d1f7b1-b9b5-428f-837d-9a032c909db7" # Retorna: 5 produtos com sucesso ``` --- ## ðŸ”§ ARQUITETURA TÃ‰CNICA ### **Frontend - React Query Integration** ```typescript // Hook de busca de produtos const { data: productsData, isLoading, error } = useQuery({ queryKey: ['products', currentBarbershop?.id], queryFn: () => apiService.products.getAll(currentBarbershop!.id), enabled: !!currentBarbershop?.id, }); // TransformaÃ§Ã£o de dados para compatibilidade const products = productsData?.data?.map(product => ({ id: product.id, name: product.name, description: product.description || '', price: product.sell_price, cost: product.cost_price || 0, stock: product.current_stock, minStock: product.min_stock || 5, isActive: product.is_active, // ... outros campos })) || []; ``` ### **API Client - String:   };

  const handleAdd = () => {
    if (!formData.name || !formData.email || !formData.phone) {
      toast.error('Preencha todos os campos obrigatÃ³rios');
      return;
    }

    const newBarber: Barber = {
      ...formData as Barber,
      id: Date.now(),
      rating: 0,
      hireDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
    };

    setBarbers([...barbers, newBarber]);
    setFormData({
      name: '',
      email: '',
      phone: '',
      specialties: [],
      status: 'ativo',
      workSchedule: '',
      address: '',
    });
    setIsAddDialogOpen(false);
    toast.success('Barbeiro adicionado com sucesso!');
  };

  const handleEdit = (barber: Barber) => {
    setSelectedBarber(barber);
    setFormData(barber);
    setIsEditDialogOpen(true);
  };

  const handleUpdate = () => {
    if (!selectedBarber || !formData.name || !formData.email || !formData.phone) {
      toast.error('Preencha todos os campos obrigatÃ³rios');
      return;
    }

    setBarbers(barbers.map(b => 
      b.id === selectedBarber.id 
        ? { ...formData as Barber, id: selectedBarber.id, rating: selectedBarber.rating, hireDate: selectedBarber.hireDate }
        : b
    ));
    setIsEditDialogOpen(false);
    setSelectedBarber(null);
    setFormData({
      name: '',
      email: '',
      phone: '',
      specialties: [],
      status: 'ativo',
      workSchedule: '',
      address: '',
    });
    toast.success('Barbeiro atualizado com sucesso!');
  };

  const handleDelete = (barberId: number) => {
    setBarbers(barbers.filter(b => b.id !== barberId));
    toast.success('Barbeiro removido com sucesso!');
  };

  const handleSpecialtyChange = (specialty: string, checked: boolean) => {
    if (checked) {
      setFormData({
        ...formData,
        specialties: [...(formData.specialties || []), specialty]
      });
    } else {
      setFormData({
        ...formData,
        specialties: (formData.specialties || []).filter(s => s !== specialty)
      });
    }
  };

  const specialtyOptions = [
    'Corte Masculino',
    'Corte Feminino', 
    'Barba',
    'Bigode',
    'Sobrancelha',
    'Corte Infantil',
    'Design',
    'ColoraÃ§Ã£o',
    'Relaxamento',
    'Progressiva'
  ];

  const getStatusColor = (status: string) => {
    switch (status) {
      case 'ativo': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800';
      case 'inativo': return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800';  
      case 'ferias': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800';
      default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800';
    }
  };

  return (</tool_use_error>

message.content:
This session is being continued from a previous conversation that ran out of context. The conversation is summarized below:
Analysis:
Looking through this conversation chronologically:

1. **Initial Request**: User asked to continue with "criaÃ§Ã£o do sistama" (system creation), which I interpreted as continuing work on a barbershop management system.

2. **System Analysis**: I analyzed the existing project structure and found it was 85% complete with a barbershop management system. The main missing components were CRUD modals for Products, Services, and Barbers.

3. **Products Implementation**: 
   - Created EditProductModal and ViewProductModal
   - Updated Products.tsx page to integrate with real API instead of mock data
   - Fixed data transformation issues (parseFloat for prices)
   - Added proper loading/error states
   - Connected action buttons (View, Edit, Delete)

4. **User Feedback on Problems**: User reported issues with "nÃ£o estou conseguindo Editar,Excluir e quando click em ver ficqa bancro" (can't edit, delete, and view shows blank). This was critical feedback.

5. **Problem Resolution**: 
   - Fixed modal integration issues
   - Corrected data type conversions
   - Added debug logging
   - Implemented delete confirmation functionality
   - Deployed fixes with tag `prod-20250923-015705`

6. **Barbers System Request**: User explicitly requested "cria o modal do Barbeiros completo editar,excliir e adicionar" (create complete barber modals for edit, delete and add).

7. **Barbers Implementation**: 
   - Created EditBarberModal with comprehensive form including working hours, specialties, commission rates
   - Created ViewBarberModal with detailed barber information display
   - Completely rewrote Barbers.tsx page to integrate with API
   - Added proper error handling and loading states
   - Integrated all three modals (Create, Edit, View)
   - Deployed with tag `barbers-20250923-021229`

The most recent work was completing the barber modals system and deploying it successfully.

Summary:
1. Primary Request and Intent:
   The user's primary request was to continue developing a barbershop management system, specifically focusing on creating complete CRUD modals for managing barbeiros (barbers). The explicit request was "cria o modal do Barbeiros completo editar,excliir e adicionar" (create complete barber modals for edit, delete and add). Prior to this, the user also reported critical issues with the product system where editing, deleting, and viewing were not working properly.

2. Key Technical Concepts:
   - React with TypeScript for frontend development
   - React Query (@tanstack/react-query) for API state management
   - Shadcn/ui component library for UI elements
   - Docker Swarm for production deployment
   - PostgreSQL database integration
   - Node.js/Express backend with TypeScript
   - Modal-based CRUD operations
   - Real-time API integration replacing mock data
   - Form validation and error handling
   - Loading states and error boundaries

3. Files and Code Sections:

   - `/frontend/src/components/modals/EditProductModal.tsx`
     - Created to enable product editing functionality
     - Includes form validation and API integration
     - Key code: Form data structure with sell_price, cost_price, current_stock fields

   - `/frontend/src/components/modals/ViewProductModal.tsx`
     - Created for detailed product viewing with financial calculations
     - Displays profit margins, stock status, and product details
     - Key code: Status badges and stock calculation logic

   - `/frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx`
     - Major refactor to integrate with real API using React Query
     - Added loading/error states and proper data transformation
     - Key code: 
     ```typescript
     const { data: productsData, isLoading, error } = useQuery({
       queryKey: ['products', currentBarbershop?.id],
       queryFn: () => apiService.products.getAll(currentBarbershop!.id),
       enabled: !!currentBarbershop?.id,
     });
     ```

   - `/frontend/src/components/modals/EditBarberModal.tsx`
     - Comprehensive barber editing modal with working hours management
     - Includes specialty selection, commission rates, and schedule configuration
     - Key code: Complex working hours object structure and specialty checkboxes

   - `/frontend/src/components/modals/ViewBarberModal.tsx`
     - Detailed barber information display with avatar, contact info, and working schedule
     - Professional layout with status badges and statistics
     - Key code: Status badge logic and working hours formatting

   - `/frontend/src/pages/Barbers.tsx`
     - Complete rewrite to integrate with API and new modals
     - Added statistics cards, search functionality, and proper table layout
     - Key code: Full component rewrite with API integration and modal handlers

4. Errors and fixes:
   - **Modal Display Issues**: User reported "ver ficqa bancro" (view shows blank) for product modals
     - Fixed by correcting data type conversions with parseFloat() for numeric fields
     - Added proper null checks and fallback values
   - **Edit Modal Not Loading Data**: Fixed by updating useEffect dependencies and data mapping
   - **Delete Button Not Working**: Connected delete handlers with confirmation dialogs
   - **API Data Type Mismatches**: Fixed transformation between API response (strings) and component expectations (numbers)
   - **Build Errors**: Resolved TypeScript type issues and missing imports

5. Problem Solving:
   Successfully resolved all reported modal functionality issues through systematic debugging with console logs, proper data transformation, and API integration. Implemented comprehensive barber management system with full CRUD operations. All systems now deployed and functional in production.

6. All user messages:
   - "Vamos seguir com o criaÃ§Ã£o do sistama" - Continue with system creation
   - "lista o que falta" - List what's missing
   - "segue com o criar do tala de produtos" - Continue with product table creation
   - "faz uns teste , Pois nÃ£o estou conseguindo Editar,Excluir e quando click em ver ficqa bancro" - Test it, because I can't edit, delete, and when I click view it shows blank
   - "cria o modal do Barbeiros completo editar,excliir e adicionar" - Create complete barber modals for edit, delete and add

7. Pending Tasks:
   - Complete documentation of the barber modals system (currently in progress)
   - Potentially implement real delete functionality in backend API
   - Consider implementing similar comprehensive modal systems for other entities if requested

8. Current Work:
   The most recent work completed was creating a comprehensive barber management system with three complete modals:
   - EditBarberModal: Full editing capabilities with working hours, specialties, and commission management
   - ViewBarberModal: Professional display of barber information with statistics
   - Complete Barbers.tsx page integration with API, loading states, and error handling
   
   The system was successfully built and deployed with tag `barbers-20250923-021229`. The user's explicit request for "cria o modal do Barbeiros completo editar,excliir e adicionar" has been fully implemented and deployed.

9. Optional Next Step:
   Based on the conversation, the current task of creating complete barber modals has been successfully completed and deployed. The last action was updating the todo list to create documentation. The natural next step would be to complete the documentation for the barber modals system that was just implemented, providing a comprehensive guide similar to what was created for the products system..
Please continue the conversation from where we left it off without asking the user any further questions. Continue with the last task that you were asked to work on.
